00023 int cimunit_mutex_init(
00024   cimunit_mutex_t *mutex, 
00025   const cimunit_mutex_attr_t *attr)
00026 {
00027   *mutex = semMCreate(0);
00028 }
00029 
00030 int cimunit_mutex_destroy(cimunit_mutex_t *mutex){
00031   return semDelete(*mutex);
00032 }
00033 
00034 int cimunit_mutex_lock(cimunit_mutex_t *mutex){
00035   return semTake(*mutex, WAIT_FOREVER);
00036 }
00037 
00038 int cimunit_mutex_unlock(cimunit_mutex_t *mutex){
00039   return semGive(*mutex);
00040 }
